properties.description:
Read data from Vuokra file, derive Vuosi -column and load the data to SQL table. 

AP: Vuokrat vuositasolle + AVG arvot

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Vuosineljannes as string,
		Alue as string,
		Huoneluku as string,
		Rahoitusmuoto as string,
		Lukumaara as string,
		Neliovuokra as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	dateFormats: ['dd/MM/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'float') ~> Vuokrahinnat2015
Vuokrahinnat2015 select() ~> Select1
Select1 derive(Vuosi = toInteger(substring(Vuosineljannes, 1, 4)),
		Paivitetty_pvm = currentUTC('GMT-3')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Vuosineljannes as string,
		Alue as string,
		Huoneluku as string,
		Rahoitusmuoto as string,
		Lukumaara as string,
		Neliovuokra as string,
		Vuosi as integer,
		Paivitetty_pvm as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Vuosineljannes as string,
		Vuosi as string,
		Alue as string,
		Huoneluku as string,
		Rahoitusmuoto as string,
		Lukumaara as string,
		Neliovuokra as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['vuokra_curated'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
